newsitem.title: USA: Commercial Bankshares sets stock dividend.
newsitem.headline: Commercial Bankshares sets stock dividend.

text.p: Commercial Bankshares Inc said on Monday that its board had set a common stock dividend payable on January 3, 1997, to all common shareholders of record as of December 10, 1996.
Stockholders will receive a stock dividend in the amount of one share for each 20 shares of common stock, the company said. Cash will be paid in lieu of fractional shares.
The company also said that stockholders will receive a cash dividend of $0.10 per share, payable on January 3, 1997, to all common shareholders of record as of December 11, 1997.
The cash dividend will include any stock received pursuant to the stock dividend.
The company paid two semi-annual dividends of $0.10 per share each in 1996.
